description: A theatrical display of coding emotions and activities. Random mood faces and dynamic activity detection based on file types present in your project.

statusLine.command: bash -c 'input=$(cat); MODEL=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".model.display_name"); DIR=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".workspace.current_dir"); MOOD_FACES=("😴" "😅" "🤔" "😎" "🤯" "🥳" "😤" "🤖"); MOOD=${MOOD_FACES[$((RANDOM % ${#MOOD_FACES[@]}))]}; ACTIVITY=$([ -f "*.py" ] && echo "🐍 Pythoning" || [ -f "*.js" ] && echo "🌐 JSing" || [ -f "*.rs" ] && echo "🦀 Rusting" || echo "💻 Coding"); TIME=$(date "+%H:%M"); ENERGY=$((RANDOM % 100 + 1)); echo "[$MODEL] $MOOD $ACTIVITY | ⚡$ENERGY% | 🕐 $TIME | 📁 ${DIR##*/}"'
